content: SFH SD Self-drilling wood trim screws Single wood screw (phosphate-coated) for fastening wood trim and base to studs ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features The screws can be driven quickly thanks to their optimized drill point geometry Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality Precisely matched to Hilti drivers and bits – helping to achieve high-quality fastenings every time All Hilti drill-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 954 performance requirements Applications Fastening wood trim to metal (14-20 ga) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Flat head Screw drive/recess type: Square Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Flat head | Screw drive/recess type | Square | Collated | No | Length | 1-5/8 in | Product Class | Standard | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 20 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 86233 - Trim head screw 6 x 1-5/8 SFH - Package Size 5000 pc
